page.title: 05HARDLEY SCHOOL
page.content: After leaving school approximately one third go on to Totton College another third go on to Tech. College, the remaining third go on either to Y.T.S. courses or a job. The Headmaster explained that the present teachers action had not affected the school too much. The pupils had only been home for two and a half days but with work. The lunch time clubs and sporting activities have been affected as has the school orchestra and choir. The pupils have taken their reports home uncompleted because teachers had insufficient time during the school day to complete them and because they are working to rule they would not complete them at home in their own time
